name: It's Not That Sirius
description:
Spend the night studying for finals with your academic rival at fantasy college. When sunrise comes, will you see her in a different light?

Play as Yu, a jerk of a vampire, who’s trying to finally get a better grade than a bright-eyed star elf named Ell’i in Fantasy Marketing class.

Complete with 3 endings!

Ally Duong (ationa): Director, Programmer, Writer

Gavin Arriaga (KirigayaArt): Artist, Writer
